edu.uci.isr.impromptu.common
Class YanceesFilter

java.lang.Object
  edu.uci.isr.yancees.filter.AbstractFilter
      edu.uci.isr.impromptu.common.YanceesFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.uci.isr.yancees.filter.FilterInterface
public class YanceesFilter
extends edu.uci.isr.yancees.filter.AbstractFilter

this filter redirects all events published using this YANCEEs instance, to all the JmDNS peers in the network. For such, it uses the services provided by the JmDNSService which should be installed as a local service. Copied from Roberto's code from file PeerPublisherInputFilter in Yancees Note that this is the old way, the 0.7 way of defining a filter. The new YANCEES uses another interface here.

Author:
Jie Ren
